name: api_get_prepay_remaining
description: Get the PrePay amount available for a given module.

function.name: api_get_prepay_remaining
function.desc: Get the PrePay amount available for a given module.

sid.name: sid
sid.description: the *Session ID* you get from the [login](#login) call

module.name: module
module.description: the module you want to check your prepay amounts on

input_comment:
* @param sid string the *Session ID* you get from the [login](#login) call
* @param module string the module you want to check your prepay amounts on
